title: The River [DVD]
creator_credit: Mark Rydell, Robert Cortess, Edward Lewis and Universal Pictures
brief_description: Family drama set in Eastern Tennessee. It tells the story of the trials and tribulations that beset a young farming family. Threatened by an overflowing weir, the modern world of big business and a bad harvest, the head of the family is forced to become a scab labourer in the local foundry during the strike, leaving his wife in charge of the homestead. Cast includes Mel Gibson and Sissy Spacek.
